amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part F of House Report 117-320 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 1, 2, 6, 7, 8, 9, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, and 17.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 1 comprised of amendments numbered 1, 2, 6, 7, 8, 9, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, and 17, printed in Part F of House Report 117-320.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 201 (Roll no. 178).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
